p: APH has undertaken seven repeated nationwide cross‐sectional integrated bio‐behavioural surveys (IBBS) over 2004 to 2017. The primary aim of this study was to use data from surveys undertaken between 2009 to 2017 to determine whether being a client of an NGO is associated with improved HIV and HCV prevention and treatment outcomes and related injecting‐ or sexual‐risk behaviours among PWID in Ukraine.
